titles.title: Selena Commemorative Coin Act
Selena Commemorative Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint commemorative coins in recognition of Selena Quintanilla.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Selena Commemorative Coin Act
This bill directs the Department of the Treasury to mint and issue coins in recognition and celebration of Selena Quintanilla, an award-winning Tejano music artist. All sales of coins issued under this bill must include a surcharge to be paid to the Friends of the Corpus Christi Museum of Science and History to support the museumâ€™s general expenses, including costs associated with museum operations and an exhibit on Selena.
